events.message: I ordered a pair of shoes last week but would like to request a refund as they do not fit properly and the product description was misleading.
System has categorised the reported customer issue as a refund request based on keywords and message content.
The case has been assigned to Customer Support Agent Jane Smith to handle the refund inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m Jane and I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Agent asks the customer to provide the order number to begin processing the refund.
Sure, my order number is #56789. I’d like to know how soon I can expect the refund once the return is processed.
Thank you for the order number. You can expect your refund within 5 to 7 business days after we receive the returned item at our warehouse.
That sounds good, thank you! I will send the shoes back today and inform you once shipped.
We have marked your refund request as being processed pending the return shipment. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm your refund has been processed successfully. Please contact us if you have not received the amount.
Since your refund has been completed and no further queries were raised, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
We have sent you a short survey about your support experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
